for i in range(int(input())):
    n=int(input())
    a=[int(k) for k in input().split()]
    ind1=0
    ind2=0
    for j in range(len(a)):
        if(a[j]==0):continue
        else:
            ind1=j
            break
    for k in range(len(a)-1,-1,-1):
        if(a[k]==0):continue
        else:
            ind2=k
            break
    #print(ind1,ind2)
    #print(a[ind1:ind2+1])
    print(len(a[ind1:ind2+1]))

# cook your dish here

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().strip().split(' ')))
    start = 0
    while start < len(a) and a[start] == 0:
        start += 1
    end = n-1
    while end >= 0 and a[end] == 0:
        end -= 1
    best = max(1, end - start + 1)
    print(best)
